page.title: 02Upper Halling by Warren
page.content:
There are just over one hundred houses in the small village of Upper Halling.It looks as if it is going to get bigger as they are now building twenty new houses where once the village chapel stood.
Next to the new houses is the very popular Jubilee Hall,which is used for such things as a clinic for babies,Church,Playgroups,Parish Meetings and bingo.It is hired out most weekends for dances and wedding receptions.
In Upper Halling there is a boat shop and a woodyard.The two pubs are "The Black Boy"and "The Robin Hood." There are several very old buildings which are lived in as houses or farmhouses.
